description: Generates an embedding URL for an Amazon QuickSight dashboard for an anonymous user. The following rules apply to a generated URL:

parameters.name: dashboardIdentifier
parameters.description: The ARN of the requested dashboard.

parameters.name: embeddingDomains
parameters.description: Fully qualified domains that you add to the allow list for access to the generated URL that is then embedded. You can list up to two domains or subdomains in each API call. To include all subdomains under a specific domain, use *. For example, https://*.amazon.com includes all subdomains under https://aws.amazon.com. (string) ---

nested_items.name: dashboardIdentifier
nested_items.description: The ARN of the returned dashboard.

nested_items.name: embeddingDomains
nested_items.description: The fully qualified domains specified in the request. The domains enable access to the generated URL that is then embedded. You can list up to two domains or subdomains in each API call. To include all subdomains under a specific domain, use *. For example, https://*.amazon.com includes all subdomains under https://aws.amazon.com.
